Class Poised

java.lang.Object
Poised
public class Poised extends Object
This is the main class of the program and which contains all the methods used in the main method.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)

    • inputNewProjectInfo

      private static ProjectInfo inputNewProjectInfo()
      The inputNewProjectInfo() method gathers input from the user in order to create a new ProjectInfo object. It takes the final project number from the mySQL table project_info, adds one, and sets it as the project number for the new ProjectInfo object.
      Returns:
      new ProjectInfo object.

    • inputNewPersonInfo

      private static Person inputNewPersonInfo(String personType)
      This method gathers input from the user in order to create a new Person object. A String of the Person Type is passed through the method in order to determine which person's information is being inputted.
      Parameters:
      personType - The type of person for the Person object
      Returns:
      new Person object.

    • addProject

      private static void addProject(Project newProject)
      The addProject() method takes a new Project object and inserts it into the PoisedPMS database. It does this by adding the information one table at a time. The project_info table is the last table to have information insert due to the fact that it's a child table of the others. Prepared statements are used inside nested try-with-resources, allowing for safer, more dynamic insertion into the mySQL database.
      Parameters:
      newProject - The type of person for the Person object

    • getViewOptions

      private static void getViewOptions()
      This method allows the user to further refine the projects they would like to view. It allows them to view incomplete projects and overdue projects.

    • printProjects

      private static void printProjects(String printParameter)
      The printProjects() method prints out either all, incomplete, or overdue projects, depending on the parameter passed through the method. It does this by first checking the parameter and creating a ResultSet. This ResultSet is then used to create an Array of Projects and if the array is not empty, then all projects are printed.
      Parameters:
      printParameter - This parameter is used to define which projects will be printed.

    • searchToUpdate

      private static void searchToUpdate()
      The searchToUpdate() method allows the user to search for a Project to update using its project name or number.

    • getUpdateOptions

      private static void getUpdateOptions(Project projectToUpdate)
      This method lets the user choose which aspect of a project they would like to update.
      Parameters:
      projectToUpdate - the project that will be updated

    • updateProjectInfo

      private static void updateProjectInfo(Project projectToUpdate)
      The updateProjectInfo() method allows a user select which aspect of the project information they would like to update. It then uses prepared statements and user's input to update that information. The project number, total owed, and the complete date of the project cannot be updated in this method.
      Parameters:
      projectToUpdate - the project that will be updated

    • updateArchitect

      private static void updateArchitect(Project projectToUpdate, String updateAspect)
      The updateArchitect() method updates the relevant information about the project's architect.
      Parameters:
      projectToUpdate - the project that will be updated
      updateAspect - the type of information being updated - ie name, phone, email, and address.

    • updateContractor

      private static void updateContractor(Project projectToUpdate, String updateAspect)
      The updateContractor() method updates the relevant information about the project's contractor.
      Parameters:
      projectToUpdate - the project that will be updated
      updateAspect - the type of information being updated - ie name, phone, email, and address.

    • updateCustomer

      private static void updateCustomer(Project projectToUpdate, String updateAspect)
      The updateCustomer() method updates the relevant information about the project's customer.
      Parameters:
      projectToUpdate - the project that will be updated
      updateAspect - the type of information being updated - ie name, phone, email, and address.

    • updateEngineer

      private static void updateEngineer(Project projectToUpdate, String updateAspect)
      The updateEngineer() method updates the relevant information about the project's structural engineer.
      Parameters:
      projectToUpdate - the project that will be updated
      updateAspect - the type of information being updated - ie name, phone, email, and address.

    • updateManager

      private static void updateManager(Project projectToUpdate, String updateAspect)
      The updateManager() method updates the relevant information about the project's project manager.
      Parameters:
      projectToUpdate - the project that will be updated
      updateAspect - the type of information being updated - ie name, phone, email, and address.

    • finalise

      private static void finalise(Project projectToUpdate)
      The finalise() method updates the pay_complete table to make the project finalised and to set the complete date to today's date. It then prints out an invoice for the customer and displays the amount they owe. If the customer has paid for the project, an invoice is not printed.
      Parameters:
      projectToUpdate - the project that will be updated.

    • deleteProject

      private static boolean deleteProject(Project projectToDelete)
      The deleteProject() required confirmation from the user before deleting the project from the relevant tables.
      Parameters:
      projectToDelete - the project that will be deleted.
      Returns:
      a boolean is returned. True is returned with the user deletes the project. False when the user does not delete the project.

    • createProjectObjects

      private static ArrayList<Project> createProjectObjects(ResultSet projectsToCreate) throws SQLException
      The createProjectObjects() method gets information about projects(s) from a ResultSet, creates Project object(s), and adds them to an array list that is then returned.
      Parameters:
      projectsToCreate - the ResultSet that contains row(s) of project information.
      Returns:
      an array list of the project(s) is returned.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • formatDate

      public static LocalDate formatDate(String stringDate)
      The formatDate() method takes a string written date (which must follow the pattern yyyy-mm-dd), formats it and parses it into a LocalDate.
      Parameters:
      stringDate - string of the date to be converted to LocalDate.
      Returns:
      a LocalDate is returned.

    • isNumeric

      private static boolean isNumeric(String string)
      The isNumeric() method takes a string and uses a try-catch block to check if it is numerical or not.
      Parameters:
      string - string to be checked.
      Returns:
      a boolean is returned.

    • validatePhoneNum

      private static String validatePhoneNum(String newPersonPhone, String personString)
      The validatePhoneNum() method checks whether an inputted string is a valid number. It does this by checking the first character of the string. If the character does not equal 0 or +, then a while loop runs until the input's first character equals one of these characters.
      Parameters:
      newPersonPhone - string to be checked.
      personString - the type of person whose number is being checked.
